name: Accommodation
description: Providers of lodging services, including hotels, resorts, motels, hostels, and bed-and-breakfast establishments, offering guests a place to stay during their travels.

name: Food and Beverage
description: Establishments serving meals, snacks, and drinks, including restaurants, cafes, bars, and nightclubs, catering to the culinary needs of tourists and travelers.

name: Travel Agencies
description: Companies that plan, organize, and book travel itineraries, including flights, accommodations, and activities, for individuals, groups, and corporate clients.

name: Tour Operators
description: Businesses that design, manage, and conduct guided tours, excursions, and activities, such as sightseeing, adventure travel, and cultural experiences, for tourists and travelers.

name: Transportation
description: Providers of transportation services, including airlines, car rental companies, taxi services, and shuttle operators, facilitating the movement of tourists and travelers.

name: Recreation and Entertainment
description: Businesses offering leisure activities, such as theme parks, museums, theaters, and sporting events, providing tourists and travelers with enjoyable experiences.

name: Event Management
description: Companies that plan, coordinate, and execute events, conferences, and meetings, catering to the needs of corporate clients, associations, and social groups.

name: Travel Technology
description: Providers of software, platforms, and systems that enable online travel bookings, reservations, and management, supporting the operations of hospitality and tourism businesses.

name: Destination Management
description: Organizations that promote, develop, and manage tourist destinations, including convention and visitor bureaus, tourism boards, and local governments.

name: Cruise Lines
description: Companies operating passenger ships that offer vacation packages, including accommodations, dining, and onboard activities, for travelers.

name: Timeshare and Vacation Ownership
description: Businesses offering shared ownership or membership models for vacation properties, providing customers with access to accommodations and amenities.

name: Wellness and Spa
description: Establishments providing health, wellness, and spa services, including fitness centers, yoga studios, and massage therapy, catering to the relaxation and rejuvenation needs of tourists and travelers.

name: Adventure and Outdoor
description: Businesses offering outdoor activities, such as hiking, skiing, and water sports, providing tourists and travelers with exciting experiences in natural environments.

name: Educational Travel
description: Organizations that design and operate educational tours, field trips, and study abroad programs, combining travel with learning and cultural immersion.
